dmca.title: Pet Friendly Barks Louder
dmca.body:
April 5, 2006

Attorney now estimates damages exceeding $450,000.00...keep up the good work and when you are deposed, please bring this with you so you can plead innocent.

Please cease and desist from using our federal trademark, Pet Friendly and Pet Friendly Hotels and Travel.

Charles W. Weinacker, Jr.
Vice President

cc: [private]
